Class PopUpBox

java.lang.Object
application.ManageData
application.PopUpBox
public class PopUpBox extends ManageData
Class for displaying alert windows, dialog boxes and various windows

    • alert

      public static void alert(String title, String message, int width)
      displays an alert window with a custom message
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window
      message - the message to be displayed
      width - width minimum width to display the message

    • display

      public static void display(String title, javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, int width)
      displays a window
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window
      pane - the content to be displayed
      width - minimum width to display the content

    • confirm

      public static boolean confirm(String title, String message)
      displays a dialog box with a custom message
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the window
      message - the message to be displayed
      Returns:
      returns true if the user selected 'yes'

    • addProduct

      public static boolean addProduct(Admin admin)
      displays a window for adding new product types into the database
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin object that performs the action
      Returns:
      returns true if the product has been added successfully

    • editEmployee

      public static boolean editEmployee(Admin admin, ArrayList<String> data)
      displays a window for editing a certain employee's account
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin object that performs the action
      data - the employee's information
      Returns:
      returns true if the employee has been edited

      public static boolean editProductType(Admin admin, ArrayList<String> data)
      displays a window for editing a certain product type
      Parameters:
      admin - the admin object that performs the action
      data - the product's information
      Returns:
      returns true if the product has been edited

    • addToCart

      public static void addToCart(Client client, String id, String quantity, String title)
      displays a window for adding a certain product to the client's cart
      Parameters:
      client - the client object that performs the action
      id - the product's ID
      quantity - the amount of products to be added to the client's cart
      title - the window's title

    • editQuantityCart

      public static boolean editQuantityCart(Client client, String id)
      displays a window for changing the quantity of a product in the client's cart
      Parameters:
      client - the client object that performs the action
      id - the product's ID which quantity will be changed
      Returns:
      returns true if the quantity has been successfully edited

    • placeOrder

      public static void placeOrder(Client client)
      displays a window for executing a client's order
      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • manageProfile

      public static int manageProfile(Client client)
      Parameters:
      client - the client object that performs the action
      Returns:
      returns 1 if the client has changed the username, returns 2 if the client has deleted his account

    • restock

      public static void restock(Employee employee, javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> data, boolean inStock)
      displays a window for performing the restock of a certain product
      Parameters:
      employee - the employee object that performs the action
      data - the ObservableList containing the information of the product
      inStock - if the product is still in stock
